SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvanceOrder
The class is advancing the armies for an attack on the desired country.
AirliftOrder
The class deals with airlifting of the armies to other countries.
BlockadeOrder
The class is responsible for the blockade.
BombOrder
The class deals with bombing of the countries using the bomb card.
Card
Distributes random cards to the players when the conditions are met.
DeployOrder
Class represents an order to deploy a certain number of armies to a specific country.
DiplomacyOrder
The class deals with the negotiation phase between the chosen players.
EditMapPhase
The class deals with the map editing.
EndGamePhase
Class deals with the End game phase, which is the final phase.
ExecuteOrderPhase
Responsible for executing the orders issued by the players during the game.
GameCommandParser
This class is responsible for parsing user input commands into primary commands and their details.
GameCommonUtils
This class provides utility methods for operations.
GameConstants
This package contains all the constant classes.
GameEngine
This class is responsible for executing the entire game process.
GameException
Throws exception
GameInformation
This class is used to set current phase, current map and other information.
GameMap
The class loads map files and displays them.
GameMapEditor
The class is used to initialize map editing phase - which consists of editing, or creating a new map.
GameMenu
The GameMenu class is the entry point of the game.
GameMessageConstants
This class initializes all the constant messages that will be used in the application.
GameStartUpPhase
Class GameStartUpPhase contains current phase, next phase, and current game information
IssueOrderPhase
Class for players to issue orders.
LoadMapPhase
The class deals with the loading of map into the game.
LogEntryBuffer
Class that acts as an Observable for the entire game
LogEntryWriter
LogEntryWriter class implements the Observer Interface
MapCommonUtils
This class reads a map file and extracts a specific section of the file based on starting and ending keywords.
Observable
Observable is an Abstract class used for performing observable methods
Observer
Observer Interface
Order
Executes the order for a player.
Phase
Templates for phases in the game
Player
Contains a players name,current armies, and issued orders.
ReinforcementPhase
This class is responsible for assigning reinforcement armies to players based on the number of countries they have conquered.
